title: RIOT IS UNFAIR
body: so when i dodge champ select because of trolls and toxic idiots . its not better to play with them. i do not  wanna lose lp. so I dodge and i get banned for so long times. THIS IS NOT  FKING FAIR. i just wanna to play a good match not with toxic and trolls people and they donot get banned WTF ?????????

replies.body: This is OCE boards not NA.
please read what you have poasted and correct it because it doesnt make sense you might need to work on your english writing skills a bit. no hate just advice <3
